channel.title: Hey guys
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
Just wanted to check in and see how things are going, not really had any involvement here for a while, but it doesn't look like anything has changed :p If there's anything you guys want doing/changing to the server, or general MoparCraft segment, even if it doesn't involve increasing activity and what not just let us know.

item.title: Hey guys
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

No, they’re separate, just use another nick for the time being until you can recover it (google the command).

https://www.moparisthebest.com/irc/?autoconnect=1&channel=moparscape&nick=UNREGISTERUSERNAMEHERE

Read full topic

item.title: Hey guys
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I guess I can make a poll since no one else has. I would be up for one, I’m more of a gatherer than a builder, and I’ve got a lot hoarded right now.

I’m also curious if anyone has looked into FTB lately? I know I ask a lot and get turned down a lot, but I kinda miss it Would be nice if we could get it going and it be stable.

Read full topic

item.title: Hey guys
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

If one of you guys wants to go ahead and make a poll, I’m sure if enough popularity is presented it can be looked into. There may be some important news announced in the near future, so I’ll hold back as to say whether multiple worlds, any other expansion can happen but as soon as stuff blows over we can discuss what the plan is.

Read full topic

item.title: Hey guys
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

I think a map reset is something that could be spoken about, or at least polled. I don’t really have much time to put into Minecraft like I used to so I probably wouldn’t get to play nearly as much as I’d like. But a map reset will give something fresh for people to do if they wish.

Read full topic

item.title: Hey guys
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Some of the members who still occasionally play were talking about a map reset for the current vanilla world (including Kickingjamie and I). It’s coming up to almost three years old and is full of ugly chunk borders, broken contraptions and a dragon I can’t kill. At this point since I’m back at uni and don’t have any time to play so it’s probably best to poll it to anyone who is active/might be interested and if there’s enough support we could potentially start a new map for people to have some fun on.

Regarding Moparcraft as a whole, minecraft amongst the community really died out as people lost interest in the game and found new things to play. I’ve seen some people still talk about wanting a server where pvp is on and you go attack people and loot their stuff or whatever but this is a high maintenance thing as people generally can get pretty salty when they lose and then reports need to be addressed. If we were looking to boost activity (I don’t know if we are or not) then I suppose a second server could be added so those who like a particular play style can do their thing?

What do you or zuppers think about trying to increase activity to Moparcraft? Is this something you’d like to see?

Read full topic
